H0.text: What noted English chemist and physicist, born on Sept 22, 1791, is responsible for the electromagnet and has the SI unit of capacitance named for him. Michael Faraday's contemporary, John Frederic Daniell

H1.text: What noted English chemist and physicist, born on Sept 22, 1791, is responsible for the electromagnet and has the SI unit of capacitance named for him. William Hyde Wollaston

H2.text: What noted English chemist and physicist, born on Sept 22, 1791, is responsible for the electromagnet and has the SI unit of capacitance named for him. Humphry Davy

H3.text: What noted English chemist and physicist, born on Sept 22, 1791, is responsible for the electromagnet and has the SI unit of capacitance named for him. Faradic

A4.text: The SI unit of capacitance, the farad, is named after him.

A5.text: He similarly discovered the principles of electromagnetic induction, diamagnetism, and the laws of electrolysis.
